text: The Sofitel Cairo Nile El Gezirah Hotel is a skyscraper hotel located in Cairo, Egypt. The 27-story building was completed in 1984 as the El Gezirah Sheraton Hotel & Towers. The modernist building is located on Sharia el Orman, and contains 4 large conference rooms. The discernible v-shaped support beams of the structure evoke those at the Dizengoff Center in Tel Aviv.http://www.emporis.com/buildings/103230/el-gezira-sheraton-hotel-cairo- egypt Emporis Page ==See also== *Skyscraper design and construction *List of tallest buildings in Cairo ==References== Category:1984 establishments in Egypt Category:Hotels in Cairo Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1984
title: Sofitel Cairo Nile El Gezirah Hotel
